K12D0488_H0454:165a-13: sgrub pa'i don yod dam tshig ni //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-14: snying pos skad cig dngos grub ster //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-15: rtsa rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-16: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-17: dngos grub mchog ni de bzhin du //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-18: bla na med pa'i ye shes grub; ;de nas dang
K12D0488_H0454:165a-19: po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad
K12D0488_H0454:165a-20: rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-22: pang ba g-yon du dgod bya ba //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-23: zhabs kyi padma ci bder bri //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-24: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-25: sku ni drang por 'dzin pa bde //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-26: bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-27: rdo rje bsnyems pa yang dag 'chang //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-30: 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:165a-31: sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dam //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-0: dngos @165b grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-3: ji bzhin phyag rgya'i rjes 'brangs nas //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-4: mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-5: sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-7: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bshad do //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-8: rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi bo 'di las byung ngo //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-9: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu'i phyi rol tu mngon par phyogs pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-11: mthe bo gnyis kha phe la mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren cing srin lag dang /
K12D0488_H0454:165b-12: mthe'u chung mnyam por sbyar la rtse mo so sor
K12D0488_H0454:165b-13: kha phye bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi bsgreng
K12D0488_H0454:165b-14: ba'o // brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-15: de bzhin du mtshams rnams la rdo rje thal mos bskor bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-16: sgo'i phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-17: bde chen mchog gi phyag rgya che //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-18: de bzhin dngos grub rab stsol ba //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-19: mda' sogs dam tshig sna tshogs pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-20: dngos grub chen po mchog ster ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-21: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
K12D0488_H0454:165b-22: ho bid h'um dhri ka h'um/
K12D0488_H0454:165b-23: de rnams kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o; ;de
K12D0488_H0454:165b-24: nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur
K12D0488_H0454:165b-25: rdo rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-0: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar @166a *//
K12D0488_H0454:166a-1: bzung bar byas pa rdo rje bsnyems pa ste /
K12D0488_H0454:166a-2: rab tu dga' ba brtan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsal ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-3: mda' gzhu gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-5: rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-7: sgeg pa dang bcas mtha' mal sogs pas bkrol bas
K12D0488_H0454:166a-8: glog 'gyu ba'i gar g-yas su yongs su bskor bas
K12D0488_H0454:166a-9: me tog la sogs pa'i ka bu ta'i thal mo
K12D0488_H0454:166a-11: rdo rje thal mo bkrol bas de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-12: rdo rje gar ni nang gi mtshams la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-13: rdzogs pa'am ni ma tshang ba //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-14: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-15: me tog mchod la sogs ma yis //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-16: dngos grub mchog stsol thun mong yin //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-18: 'di rnams kyang don yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams so //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdud rtsi'i chu bzla'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-20: 'jug pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
K12D0488_H0454:166a-21: dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje slob
K12D0488_H0454:166a-22: dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig
K12D0488_H0454:166a-23: ces bya ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa ni
K12D0488_H0454:166a-24: / rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-25: g-yon mtheb mdzub mo'i skye gnas su //
K12D0488_H0454:166a-26: g-yas pa mthe po'i ltag bcug la //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-0: btsir ba bde ba @166b ster ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-1: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa des /
K12D0488_H0454:166b-3: yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug /
K12D0488_H0454:166b-5: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-6: rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu
K12D0488_H0454:166b-7: blangs nas chu'i rgyun des dbang bskur te 'thung du
K12D0488_H0454:166b-8: bcug na dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-9: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis na tshod dar la bab pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:166b-11: dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-17: phyag rgya la sogs pas gnod pa byed par mi nus so //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-18: skyil mo krung gis ni gar dang /
K12D0488_H0454:166b-20: de nas mchod pa ni rdo rje gar gyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-21: rdo rje glu blangs pas rdo rje gar dbul ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gar gyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-22: rdo rje khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:166b-23: gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa bsgreng
K12D0488_H0454:166b-24: bar bya ste / mthar sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo
K12D0488_H0454:166b-25: rje gsang ba'i bzhad pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang
K12D0488_H0454:166b-26: bar bya ste / / spyan g-yo bas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-27: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang dgyes pas dga' ba thams cad la sogs pa'i bde ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:166b-28: yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba yin no //
K12D0488_H0454:166b-29: rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba rang gi snying gar
K12D0488_H0454:166b-30: bde ba dgrol na dkyil 'khor dgrol ba la rdo
K12D0488_H0454:167a-1: sgom pas re kh'a dang rdo rje yid kyis gyen
K12D0488_H0454:167a-2: du bteg la rim pas nang gi dkyil 'khor du
K12D0488_H0454:167a-3: zhugs na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom pas dkyil 'khor la phyogs na dam tshig nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-5: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni /
K12D0488_H0454:167a-6: bde ba chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:167a-8: snying gar bzhag pa phub ste /
K12D0488_H0454:167a-9: phyogs thams cad du 'bar ba'i ra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0488_H0454:167a-10: rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang 'jug par mi nus so //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-11: snying gar sgom pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-12: gyen du kha blta bas ltung bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-13: rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs nas gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-14: dbus ma'i rdo rje brtag par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-15: dpung mgo gnyis su bzhag cing snying gar bzhag par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-16: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mthong ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-21: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i rtags kyi lcags kyus so //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-22: rtse mo gtod pa'i skye gnas bkrol ba lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil nyed cing bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167a-25: bskor zhing btsir nas khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-0: yongs su bskor nas kha'i mthar mche ba bstan pa'i g-yas pa'i mdzub mos @167b sdigs mdzub bo //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-1: mdzub mo la ldang bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-3: yi ge mus phyag rgya dgrol ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-4: dang po mthe'u chung gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-5: de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong pas so //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-6: de nyid yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gyen du kha blta bas gnas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-7: de nyid kyis nam mkha' la rdeg pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-8: g-yo zhing btsum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya bcings pa dgrol ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-9: mthe'u chung gi nor bus reg par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-10: mdzub mo mnyam pas zhabs kyi sor mo brje bar bya ste /
K12D0488_H0454:167b-13: mdzub mos sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-14: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-16: mthe'u chung gnyis skye gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya dral bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-17: srin lag dang mtha' ma mnyam par sbyar sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du bsgreng bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-18: rdo rje bsdams pas legs par byed pa mdzub mo
K12D0488_H0454:167b-19: mthe bong mnyam por phye ba dang bkug pa bskor
K12D0488_H0454:167b-21: rdo rje bsdams pa rab tu brkyang pa'i mthil sa la reg par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-22: dang po'i rdo rje sprin skyed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-23: mdzub mos char bskyed par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-25: rdo rje blta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-26: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-27: mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:167b-28: mthe'u chung rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-1: nas chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-2: bde ba chen po rdo rje sa la bzung nas g-yo bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-3: mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-4: rtse mo bzhi'i 'od zer gyis me stag ston pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-6: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo'i rtse mos me long dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168a-8: nam mkha' la rdo rje blta ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168a-10: rdo rje'i mdangs shing drung thams cad dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168a-13: 'bru thams cad la gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-14: mdzub mo rnon pos klog par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-15: bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-16: phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis glog 'gyu bas bskor bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-18: glog 'gyu bas nam mkha' la bskor bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-19: g-yas pas g-yon pa la brdeg par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g-yo zhing g-yo ba med pa la gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-21: mdzub mo mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-22: mdzub mo'i rdo rje'i g-yon pa'i mthe bong gi bu gar g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168a-23: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes steng du nam mkha' la dka' ba bskyod pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168a-25: dbus ma'i rdo rje bskyod cing btsir ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-0: rdo rje yid @168b las byung ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168b-1: rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168b-3: rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-4: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos gsol ba 'debs par
K12D0488_H0454:168b-5: byed pas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rang gi mig bkab
K12D0488_H0454:168b-6: la yid kyis ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgom
K12D0488_H0454:168b-7: par bya'o // sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-8: mdzub mos rang mig btsum par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-11: rtse mo bskyod cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-12: mthe bo'i 'og tu rab tu brkyang la sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-13: rdo rje sku'i phyag rgya mchog ni mthe bong sems
K12D0488_H0454:168b-14: dpa'i skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo rdo rje ni
K12D0488_H0454:168b-16: dbus ma'i mnyam pa'i mgo lcogs kyis ngag 'byin pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-18: aom bo dhi tsitta auta p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba bsgom mo //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-19: mthe bo'i rtags g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyu ba ltar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-21: rdo rje bsnyems ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-22: yi ge h'um gis sdigs mdzub bo //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-23: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyi kha sbyor ro //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-24: rdo rje bsnyems ma bshad do //
K12D0488_H0454:168b-25: mthe'u chung gi zur gyis mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongs su bskor /
K12D0488_H0454:168b-26: 'og nas bteg pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:168b-27: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya 'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-2: rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-3: mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje snying
K12D0488_H0454:169a-4: gar badzro ham zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen
K12D0488_H0454:169a-5: po'o // de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje sgom zhing ma h'a sa ha ham zhes bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-6: ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta th'a ga to:
K12D0488_H0454:169a-7: ham bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bshad
K12D0488_H0454:169a-9: rdo rje khu tshur bcing pa ni //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-10: mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pa bcing //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-11: mdzub mo bkug pa gnyis kyis brgyan //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-12: mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-13: mthe bong gnyis kyi kha sbyar ba //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-14: dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:169a-15: khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-16: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtags ////
K12D0488_H0454:169a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i
K12D0488_H0454:169a-18: rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen
K12D0488_H0454:169a-19: po rnams ni ta th'a ga to nya ham zhes
K12D0488_H0454:169a-21: dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthe bong mthe chung mnyam pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-22: rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje 'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-23: mda' la sogs pa bcing ba ni de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-24: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni nyid do //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba 'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169a-27: khu tshur gyi khyad par rdo rje bsngams pa'i khu
K12D0488_H0454:169b-0: tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa @169b dam tshig
K12D0488_H0454:169b-2: de gnyis su byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-4: dkyil 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-5: 'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-6: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-9: bskor zhing bskor bas mkhur tshos dang /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-10: gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-13: g-yon pa snying gar bzung ste /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-14: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis sa la reg pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-15: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo g-yas pa'i khu tshur
K12D0488_H0454:169b-16: gyi nang du mngon par phyogs pas de bzhin gshegs
K12D0488_H0454:169b-17: pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du
K12D0488_H0454:169b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas brtan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo ////
K12D0488_H0454:169b-20: de nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni /
K12D0488_H0454:169b-21: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-22: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:169b-23: dam tshig ni 'og du rdo rje bsngams pa'i sor
K12D0488_H0454:169b-24: mo thams cad 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rdo
K12D0488_H0454:169b-25: rje ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri
K12D0488_H0454:169b-26: ste / rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-2: chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te /
K12D0488_H0454:170a-3: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-4: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-5: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bo //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-6: dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-7: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-8: lag pa rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i sdigs mdzub ni /
K12D0488_H0454:170a-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad de g-yon brkyang pas gnas pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-10: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-13: khros pas yi ge aa sbyar bar bya 'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-14: ha har dgod pas bzhad par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-15: snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:170a-16: de nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni /
K12D0488_H0454:170a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug
K12D0488_H0454:170a-18: la de'i snying gar gzhag pa ni rdo rje padma'o
K12D0488_H0454:170a-19: // phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-20: dam tshig gi khyad par dang /
K12D0488_H0454:170a-21: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-22: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:170a-23: mthe'u chung kha phye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i padma chen po'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-24: thams cad bcing ba ni ci lta ba bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:170a-25: khu tshur gyi khyad par ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i
K12D0488_H0454:170a-26: mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam par brkyang
K12D0488_H0454:170b-0: la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol tu @170b gshibs pa
K12D0488_H0454:170b-1: dang bcas pa bzhag pa ste de gnyis su byas
K12D0488_H0454:170b-3: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni padma chen po'i bshad pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-5: de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-6: de nyid sor mo thams cad kha phye bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-7: de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go /
K12D0488_H0454:170b-8: de nyid legs par byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-9: de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-10: de nyid g-yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags bcag pa'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:170b-11: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi chog rgyas pa ni /
K12D0488_H0454:170b-12: rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong
K12D0488_H0454:170b-13: mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste dpral
K12D0488_H0454:170b-14: ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur ba
K12D0488_H0454:170b-16: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-17: dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis
K12D0488_H0454:170b-18: phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe
K12D0488_H0454:170b-19: bong rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-20: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-21: de gnyis su byas nas rin bo che'i khu tshur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:170b-22: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:170b-23: rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu
K12D0488_H0454:170b-24: gu'o // kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung
K12D0488_H0454:170b-25: mnyam por kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin
K12D0488_H0454:170b-26: gu'o // pa'o // dbus ma'i nor bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-3: rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-4: logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-5: rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag
K12D0488_H0454:171a-6: ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar
K12D0488_H0454:171a-8: mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la
K12D0488_H0454:171a-9: mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i
K12D0488_H0454:171a-10: mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0488_H0454:171a-12: des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-15: g-yon du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-17: logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-18: bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-19: phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud ba bya zhing dar dpyangs kyis tshul du bya ste /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa
K12D0488_H0454:171a-21: gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:171a-22: sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-23: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-24: de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te /
K12D0488_H0454:171a-25: phyag rgya chen po ni g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171a-26: dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171b-0: srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar @171b la rtse
K12D0488_H0454:171b-1: gsum par byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis
K12D0488_H0454:171b-2: lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-3: ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-4: dam tshig ni gung me dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:171b-7: srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-8: gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i
K12D0488_H0454:171b-9: tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par
K12D0488_H0454:171b-10: 'gyur te dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin
K12D0488_H0454:171b-11: no // lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:171b-12: de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g-yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang /
K12D0488_H0454:171b-13: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
K12D0488_H0454:171b-14: lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-15: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pas
K12D0488_H0454:171b-16: rtse mo phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad
K12D0488_H0454:171b-17: kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa
K12D0488_H0454:171b-20: dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-21: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:171b-22: gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas
K12D0488_H0454:171b-23: la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus
K12D0488_H0454:171b-24: nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos brdegs par byas
K12D0488_H0454:172a-2: dug thams cad bcing ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:172a-3: kun nas bsdus te brdegs pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-4: 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:172a-6: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12D0488_H0454:172a-7: de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-8: zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:172a-9: gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas
K12D0488_H0454:172a-10: gsungs so // de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12D0488_H0454:172a-11: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-12: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-14: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-15: rdo rje nor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172a-16: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12D0488_H0454:172a-17: snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus
K12D0488_H0454:172a-18: pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu
K12D0488_H0454:172a-19: blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs
K12D0488_H0454:172a-20: la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go /
K12D0488_H0454:172a-22: mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba med cing ngos shin
K12D0488_H0454:172a-23: tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i
K12D0488_H0454:172a-24: ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste
K12D0488_H0454:172a-26: sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge h'um gi sgra phra
K12D0488_H0454:172a-27: mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo
K12D0488_H0454:172b-0: rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo @172b rje'i rigs so
K12D0488_H0454:172b-1: // ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-2: chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-3: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste /
K12D0488_H0454:172b-4: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-5: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-6: bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-7: sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-8: nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:172b-9: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12D0488_H0454:172b-10: rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:172b-11: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-12: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa
K12D0488_H0454:172b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs
K12D0488_H0454:172b-14: pa'i rigs la'o // 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:172b-15: rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis
K12D0488_H0454:172b-17: padma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i padma'i khu tshur gyis padma'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:172b-18: rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:172b-19: de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs
K12D0488_H0454:172b-20: pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na
K12D0488_H0454:173a-0: nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog @173a *//
K12D0488_H0454:173a-1: gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa
K12D0488_H0454:173a-2: thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan
K12D0488_H0454:173a-3: 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba'i
K12D0488_H0454:173a-4: mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
K12D0488_H0454:173a-5: so // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po
K12D0488_H0454:173a-6: ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam
K12D0488_H0454:173a-7: so // tshig go / gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o //
K12D0488_H0454:173a-8: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o //
K12D0488_H0454:173a-9: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i 'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:173a-10: de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te /
K12D0488_H0454:173a-11: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i
K12D0488_H0454:173a-12: lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa
K12D0488_H0454:173a-13: dang / dbang du byed pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173a-15: brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so
K12D0488_H0454:173a-16: sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
K12D0488_H0454:173a-17: rigs la'o // rdo rje phra mos byin gyis brlabs te /
K12D0488_H0454:173a-18: dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173a-22: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub
K12D0488_H0454:173a-23: thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
K12D0488_H0454:173a-24: las byung ba'o // khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro
K12D0488_H0454:173a-25: bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba byas nas shin tu
K12D0488_H0454:173a-26: ma mgal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173b-5: gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173b-6: thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub skad
K12D0488_H0454:173b-7: cig mas 'byung par 'gyur ba ni khro bo'i rdo
K12D0488_H0454:173b-9: btsums pa med pas brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas
K12D0488_H0454:173b-10: mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
K12D0488_H0454:173b-11: sbyang ba dang / bsrung ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173b-12: ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-13: 'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173b-14: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0488_H0454:173b-15: mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro ////
K12D0488_H0454:173b-16: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-17: nyin re mngon du lan gcig tu //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-18: snying po rang nyid bsgrub pa ste //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-19: rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pas //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-20: phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-21: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ni //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-22: snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-23: sgrub pa 'di ni rmad du byung //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-24: ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-25: nye ba'i snying po gsang ba 'o //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-26: don yod thogs med gsang ba dang //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-27: rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-28: bsod nams med pa rnams la yang //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-29: dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:173b-30: dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-2: gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-4: gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-5: phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-6: gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-7: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-8: dum bu gnyis pa sngags dum gyi rtsa rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12D0488_H0454:174a-9: sems can thams cad bde don dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-10: bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-11: sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-12: rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-13: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-14: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-15: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-16: sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-17: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-18: 'dir ni rtog pa gang zhig brjod //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-19: snying po zhes ni gang bshad pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-20: ye shes rgyud ni ji ltar yin //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-21: dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod pa ci //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-22: der 'jug yon tan ci dang ldan //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-23: rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-24: gzhan yang sgrub pa ji lta bu //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-26: 'di yang ci ltar de nyid gang //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-27: thog ma tha ma med nyid dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-28: rab tu dga' ba ji ltar 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-29: dang po'i snying po 'di yi yin //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-30: de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin //
K12D0488_H0454:174a-31: h'um gi glu ni gang gis gsungs //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-0: 'di yi don ni ji ltar @174b brjod //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-1: sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-2: de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-3: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-4: rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-6: sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-7: rtogs pa rnams kyang bsgrub pa dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-8: dang po'i snying po'i de nyid dang //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-9: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:174b-10: sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams //

K12D0488_H0454:198a-12: rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /

K12D0488_H0454:198a-38: // lha thams cad dbab pa dang /

K12D0488_H0454:264b-29: de bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-30: rang nyid kyis nga ro bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-32: bdag nyid la brdog par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-33: snying gar brdeg par sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-34: rang nyid kyis rang gi skra 'bal bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-36: rang gi gos bstod par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-37: khro bos de bzhin du 'bar ba ston pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-38: g-yas pas mdzub mo lcags kyu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:264b-39: de nyid kyis rab tu gzhug pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-2: lce reg pa ni mdzub mo gnyis kyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-3: yan lag la ba spu g-yas su bskor bas 'khyil /
K12D0488_H0454:265a-5: ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-7: khro bo'i lta bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-15: khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi lta bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-16: mdzum pa med pas lta bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-17: de bzhin du 'bar ba 'ching bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-19: gtsug tor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-20: de bzhin du snying gar ro //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-22: phyag rgya zur du bslang ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-23: mdzub mo'i rtse mo brtan par sbyar ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-24: lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-28: rdo rje kha tv'am ga dral ba khro bas so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-29: rdo rje snying gar bsgom pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-30: rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-31: gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-35: de nyid kyi dong rtse gsor ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-36: khro bo'i lta bas bzhin du'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-37: khu tshur g-yas pas mnan te g-yon pas so //
K12D0488_H0454:265a-39: dong rtse gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-0: @265b g-yon pa'i dril bu dral ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-1: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yas pa'i
K12D0488_H0454:265b-2: khu tshur g-yon pa'i rdo rje khro pos mnan te
K12D0488_H0454:265b-3: / mthe'u chung gi gdu bu dkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-4: g-yas pa'i dril bu dral ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-5: tshegs dang bral ba ltung ba ni yid kyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-8: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yon pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te /
K12D0488_H0454:265b-9: de bzhin du gdu bu bkrol bas 'phrog par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0488_H0454:265b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-14: rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12D0488_H0454:265b-15: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
K12D0488_H0454:265b-16: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni padma chen po rdo rje'i thal
K12D0488_H0454:265b-17: mo kha spub pa dbu ma dang /
K12D0488_H0454:265b-19: mthe'u chung kha phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhin pa chos nyid thams cad thob pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:265b-20: thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-21: phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-22: dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje padma bshad pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-23: padma'i rigs rnams kyi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-24: de la padma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:265b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i padma pang par gyen du kha
K12D0488_H0454:265b-26: phye ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can
K12D0488_H0454:266a-2: rdo rje padma chen po'i rdo rje padma snying gar
K12D0488_H0454:266a-3: rdo rje bcing ba rdo rje padma'i chags pa zhes
K12D0488_H0454:266a-4: bya'o // padma chen po'i bdag po'i mdzub mo mnyam
K12D0488_H0454:266a-5: pa 'og tu kha lta ba pang bar bzung ba
K12D0488_H0454:266a-6: padma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-7: padma chen po'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing des padma sbyin pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-8: 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-9: thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-10: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-12: rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-13: de nas padma'i lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-14: de la don yod pa'i rgyal po ni 'og tu
K12D0488_H0454:266a-15: mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro gnyer la
K12D0488_H0454:266a-17: padmo'i khro gnyer gyi spyan no //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-18: rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-19: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bong yongs su bzung ste /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-20: dung gi dbyibs de g-yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba bteg ste /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-21: mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i padma dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266a-22: sor mo lhag ma yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo ni khyab 'jug ma'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266a-23: padma las byung ba'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266b-0: sor mo lhag ma kha phye ba'i padma las byung @266b ba'i zhes bya bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-1: rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar
K12D0488_H0454:266b-2: ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu
K12D0488_H0454:266b-3: brkyang ba'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266b-4: mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor
K12D0488_H0454:266b-5: phye la g-yon g-yo zhing bzung ba ni padma'i lcags
K12D0488_H0454:266b-7: 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266b-10: dgug pa thams cad kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-12: de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni kha tv'am ga
K12D0488_H0454:266b-13: bcings nas padma'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
K12D0488_H0454:266b-14: phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bas so
K12D0488_H0454:266b-15: // ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs dgug pa
K12D0488_H0454:266b-16: ni chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o
K12D0488_H0454:266b-17: // // padma chen po bcings nas yid kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-21: zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-22: las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-23: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12D0488_H0454:266b-24: de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin no //
K12D0488_H0454:266b-25: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen te mthe bong dang /
K12D0488_H0454:266b-26: mdzub mo'i sor bzhi'i rtse mo bsnyams nas 'og tu rab tu bsdus te //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-0: dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal @267a *//
K12D0488_H0454:267a-1: mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-2: des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-3: rdo rje de nyid snying gar ro //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-6: khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-7: 'di nyid dbus su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar gzung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-8: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter
K12D0488_H0454:267a-9: gyi mchod pa thob pa'i don du yang dag par
K12D0488_H0454:267a-10: rdzogs pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam
K12D0488_H0454:267a-11: tshig ni gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o
K12D0488_H0454:267a-12: rdzogs pa'o // // g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bstod nas g-yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-13: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'i nyid kyis so //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-14: snying po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka'
K12D0488_H0454:267a-15: bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor
K12D0488_H0454:267a-16: ba'o // gal te ma grub na dbang bskur bar
K12D0488_H0454:267a-17: gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis nam mkhar las
K12D0488_H0454:267a-18: thams cad kyi bka' bsgo ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-19: chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-20: don yod thogs med grub pa dang //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-21: las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-22: ngag gi phyag rgya'i bka' bsgo ba //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-23: thams cad myur du mkha' las byung //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-24: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:267a-25: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12D0488_H0454:267a-26: de nas phyi'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen po ni
K12D0488_H0454:267b-0: @267b g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas na mda' gtod
K12D0488_H0454:267b-1: pa'o // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-2: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-3: mthe'u chung gi gdu bus lu gu rgyud bcing bar byas la mdzub mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-5: srin lag bsnyams te rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-6: ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams kyi'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus ma dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-8: srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-9: mthe'u chung bzhi'i rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-10: sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-11: gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi brtag par ma nus
K12D0488_H0454:267b-12: na de'i tshe 'di bcings te bltas na dkyil 'khor
K12D0488_H0454:267b-13: brtag pa dang / mthong ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-14: mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-15: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe
K12D0488_H0454:267b-16: bong bcings nas phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'i sor
K12D0488_H0454:267b-17: mo'i gdengs ka sgreng ba ste /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-18: klu thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-21: dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
K12D0488_H0454:267b-22: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-23: lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:267b-24: dbus ma srin lag bzhi'i mdud pa legs par byed
K12D0488_H0454:267b-25: pa'i sbyor bas nye bar gtod cing bsdus la mthe'u
K12D0488_H0454:267b-26: chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis brdeg par bya
K12D0488_H0454:268a-2: kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-3: 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad bza' ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:268a-6: gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis
K12D0488_H0454:268a-7: bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par
K12D0488_H0454:268a-8: bya'o // phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12D0488_H0454:268a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-10: rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-11: ba dan gsum ni yongs su bzung //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-12: rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-13: dor na thams cad gcod par byed //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-14: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra
K12D0488_H0454:268a-15: thams cad kyi mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung
K12D0488_H0454:268a-17: mthe'u chung mthe bong dang sprel ba'i //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-18: lag gnyis steng dang 'og tu ni //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-19: dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-20: rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-21: rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i
K12D0488_H0454:268a-22: dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam
K12D0488_H0454:268a-23: tshig go / rdo rje padma mnyam gzhag nas //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-24: gang der ci bzhin de bzhin du //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-25: shin tu thob dka'i sangs rgyas kyang //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-26: bsgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-27: rdo rje chos nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-28: mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug /
K12D0488_H0454:268a-29: mthe bo rdo rje bkab pa ste //
K12D0488_H0454:268a-30: rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-0: zhes @268b bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-1: de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs
K12D0488_H0454:268b-2: pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i
K12D0488_H0454:268b-4: de la dang por re zhig dang po'i dngos grub
K12D0488_H0454:268b-5: brgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab
K12D0488_H0454:268b-6: tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong
K12D0488_H0454:268b-7: du 'gyur te / ci lta ba bzhin du dam
K12D0488_H0454:268b-8: tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g-yas pa
K12D0488_H0454:268b-9: du 'gyur te / dang / g-yon pa dag gi
K12D0488_H0454:268b-10: rdo rje chen po'i sbyor bas las thams cad kyi
K12D0488_H0454:268b-11: dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du
K12D0488_H0454:268b-12: du 'gyur te / dang / 'gyur te / rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pas so //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-13: de ltar rang gi phyag mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo
K12D0488_H0454:268b-14: rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i
K12D0488_H0454:268b-15: las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje
K12D0488_H0454:268b-17: de ltar lag pa g-yas pa dang /
K12D0488_H0454:268b-18: g-yon pa'i gcig shos kyis las thams cad rab tu
K12D0488_H0454:268b-19: sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi
K12D0488_H0454:268b-20: pa'o // de ltar ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcing
K12D0488_H0454:268b-21: ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad
K12D0488_H0454:268b-22: bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-23: de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-24: 'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-25: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-26: rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-27: de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du byung //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-28: mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad sbyong byed pa //
K12D0488_H0454:268b-29: mchog dang po yi bla ma bla na med //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-2: dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las /
K12D0488_H0454:269a-3: rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12D0488_H0454:269a-4: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-5: gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-6: de nyid phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po'i //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-7: mtshon cha dam pa 'di gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog
K12D0488_H0454:269a-9: pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog
K12D0488_H0454:269a-10: pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba /
K12D0488_H0454:269a-14: gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa /
K12D0488_H0454:269a-15: bla na med pa'i bla ma /
K12D0488_H0454:269a-16: mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba
K12D0488_H0454:269a-17: bsgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos
K12D0488_H0454:269a-18: grub thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don
K12D0488_H0454:269a-19: yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-20: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:269a-21: ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung la dga' ba chen
K12D0488_H0454:269a-22: pos dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing byed
K12D0488_H0454:269a-23: pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
K12D0488_H0454:269a-24: dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub
K12D0488_H0454:269a-25: par byed pa'o // bde ba chen po'i gsang ba
K12D0488_H0454:269a-26: chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i
K12D0488_H0454:269a-27: par byed pa'o // phyag rgya'o // de bzhin gshegs
K12D0488_H0454:269a-28: pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen pos dgod cing

K12D0488_H0454:279b-12: phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags //

K12D0488_H0454:279b-14: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-15: rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-16: don yod kun grub bde bar gsol //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-19: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12D0488_H0454:279b-20: de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa
K12D0488_H0454:279b-21: tshad med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing
K12D0488_H0454:279b-22: lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i
K12D0488_H0454:279b-23: bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis
K12D0488_H0454:279b-24: las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes
K12D0488_H0454:279b-25: bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams
K12D0488_H0454:279b-26: cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-27: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-28: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-29: sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-30: las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya //
K12D0488_H0454:279b-31: thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-1: rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi
K12D0488_H0454:280a-2: phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog
K12D0488_H0454:280a-3: tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams
K12D0488_H0454:280a-4: kyi phyag rgya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-5: kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-6: mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-7: las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-8: zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-9: rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-10: thal mos sbyi bor bzung nas ni //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-11: las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-12: dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-13: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-14: rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-15: sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol bas //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-16: de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-18: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don
K12D0488_H0454:280a-19: yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i
K12D0488_H0454:280a-21: rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-22: thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-23: mchog dang po yi las chen po'i //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-24: phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-25: zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya /
K12D0488_H0454:280a-26: mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-27: las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya //
K12D0488_H0454:280a-28: rab tu dga' mchog sgra bkrol bar //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-0: bde ba @280b nyid du mngon par sbyar //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-1: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-3: ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-4: las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-5: mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag /
K12D0488_H0454:280b-6: ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-7: rdo rje lha mo'i kha tv'am ga /
K12D0488_H0454:280b-8: lus kun gyis ni gar bya zhing //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-9: rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-10: dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-11: ji ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-12: rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-13: rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-14: phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-15: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu
K12D0488_H0454:280b-16: mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong mchog
K12D0488_H0454:280b-17: tu grub pa'o // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:280b-18: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-19: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-20: phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-21: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-22: dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-23: nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-25: dam pa mchog tu grub par byed //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-26: mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-27: dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster //
K12D0488_H0454:280b-28: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:280b-29: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-2: bstan par bya ste gzhan la min //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-3: de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-4: mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-5: dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-6: mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-8: dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12D0488_H0454:281a-9: de nas sems dpa' chen po kun //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-10: rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:281a-11: rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-12: mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-13: kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-14: dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-15: rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-16: de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-17: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-18: rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-19: gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-20: dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-21: de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-22: rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-23: rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-24: sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-25: de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-26: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni //
K12D0488_H0454:281a-27: byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-0: bdud @281b dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-1: byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-2: rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-3: phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-4: ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-5: 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-6: ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-7: khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-8: dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-9: de ci nye snying ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-10: bde chen rdo rje chen po yi //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-11: don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-12: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-13: de yi rnam smin ji ltar bu //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-14: thig gdab ba dang brtag pa yis //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-15: dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-16: gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-17: ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-18: dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-19: rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-20: thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang /
K12D0488_H0454:281b-21: phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-22: thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-23: bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-24: de ni de nyid gsang ba dang //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-25: don yod pa ni mchog nyid de //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-27: thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-28: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-29: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-30: rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni //
K12D0488_H0454:281b-31: the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-2: de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-3: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-4: sems can don yod yongs brtags bas //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-5: des na rtog par gsungs pa ste //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-6: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-7: de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-8: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-9: phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-10: de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-11: phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-12: de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-13: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-14: rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-15: bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-16: grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-17: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
K12D0488_H0454:282a-18: rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na
K12D0488_H0454:282a-19: nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-20: de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-21: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-22: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-23: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282a-26: dkon mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-27: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12D0488_H0454:282a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-0: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog @282b de la
K12D0488_H0454:282b-1: bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar
K12D0488_H0454:282b-2: yin zhe na / nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-3: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-5: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-6: de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-7: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-8: gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-9: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-10: de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-11: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-12: dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-13: rdo rje dbang phyug chen bstod pas //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-14: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /
K12D0488_H0454:282b-15: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-16: mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-18: dngos grub kun gyi 'byor ba rnams //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-20: zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-21: de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom
K12D0488_H0454:282b-22: ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par
K12D0488_H0454:282b-23: bya'o // zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:282b-24: de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283a-1: gyis mi khyab rgya che ba //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-2: thab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-3: thams cad khyab cing dri ma med //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-4: byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-5: de nas 'di'i las kyi khyad par ni //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-6: sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-7: ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag /
K12D0488_H0454:283a-8: rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-9: rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283a-11: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-12: bdag la byin rlabs mchog bsgrub pa //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-13: nyin re sgrub par byed na des //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-15: de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283a-16: snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-17: gang phyir sems can don gyur pas //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-18: de phyi nga ni kun tu bzang //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-20: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283a-21: sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-22: sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-23: rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-24: bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin //

K12D0488_H0454:283a-27: rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283a-28: byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-0: de phyir de nyid sangs @283b rgyas nyid //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-1: bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-2: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283b-3: mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-4: gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-5: sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-6: byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-7: kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-8: mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-9: brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-10: des na phyag na rdo rje des //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-11: de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283b-12: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-13: yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-15: rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-16: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang /
K12D0488_H0454:283b-18: bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-19: dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-20: dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-21: bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-22: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283b-23: bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-24: nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-25: gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-26: 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum nga //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-27: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyin yid zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:283b-28: nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde //
K12D0488_H0454:283b-29: bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:284a-2: sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no //
K12D0488_H0454:284a-3: zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0488_H0454:284a-4: de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na /
K12D0488_H0454:284a-5: srid pa shin tu grub pa yi //
K12D0488_H0454:284a-6: dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir //
K12D0488_H0454:284a-7: gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir //
